data.name: richTextBox1.Text
data.value:
October 2015 *Small fixes - Fixed Exp Gem option glitches. - Andor 80 can be added to alarm maps list. - PND diond and PND before curse options added to all monsters tab. - Added option to destroy tonics on Hunting tab.
August 2015 *stuff - 'Chaos 1' can now be added to alarm maps list (in Alarms Tab). - Hardcoded monster lists for 'All Monsters' tab for the MAIN master/medenian hunting areas. - Added Exp Gem to Hunting tab. - Added Ascension tab in General tab to track daily progress. - Added Skulled tab to easier keep track of alts that LOG OUT while skulled. - Auto walker now uses carpet merchant to tagor instead of songs from medenian inns. - No longer targets Pet Pigs (cept in pig chase event). - Fixed breisleich option to work with HoF, added hit counter. - Added auto-refresh if your spell cast doesn't land after 7 seconds. - Adjusted the bots 'Target View Area' (added 2 more rows at the bottom, so it can 'see' and cast on stuff down there). - Fixed the 'was seen!' message from displaying alt/friend names. - Added option to un-check loot option around non-friends.. (leaving it up to you to re-check it when you feel its safe). - Added gold check to komadium/hemloch buying. - Fixed the load mappack popup glitch in Configure Waypoints popup.
May 2015 *Misc stuff again. - Added necklace switch optional in Skills Tab (for bashers). - Fixed a recent (from last update) glitch that caused chars to not want to cast and stuff. - Fixed glitches related to the macro.xml file and unable to log char. - Added Giant Ant and Gold Beet in SW 1/2 to All Monsters tab spell attacking. - Added White Baboon Counter in YT 24 and Boss Timer. - Added Fowls Counter and Quest Timer. - Pathfinding now ignores a hidden ishikawa in your path....(so it doesn't walk around him...hopefully this doesn't cause problems!) - Added Labor/Faith/Stuck checks to auto-song-prayer at Inns. - Updated Safe Mode finally (no more floaty hidden names or bot messages....rogue tab map can't be disabled sry).
April 2015 *Misc Fixes. - Fixed dojo. - Fixed mdsg spam. - Fixed spell lines for seargs and UE. - Added 'Regged' check for using Glowing Stone trinket. - Fixed hwarone carpet merchant. - Fixed world map hangups (i think all of them?). - Fixed /walk tagor bank, and /walk suomi bank/inn - Fixed walking thru ruc/inn to get to andor - Walking somewhere now enables heals/ao/dion. - Added Lumen Amulet to neck switching (sw or w/e). - Fixed 'crasher after dion'. - Added Claw Slash to 'Use Skills' option.
December 2014 *Updates and Fixes. - Added gold check for entering dojo. - Fixed Auto Hemloch while hunting, and added it to macro crasher with hems option. - Added a delay to using triple imp bonus and shrooms/runes finally (no more double item usage). - Fixed walking to Abel areas from Pravat. - If Map Alarm is OFF, you will still get the in-game message that someone was seen. - Fixed casting dions/hide in Combo utility. - Fixed instant ascension (no more glitched popup yay). - Fixed Re-enter Insect Event option on misc tab. - Disable 1/2 spell speed option now disables manual casting hax too. - New Feature: Legend Mark Checklist. - Finally added Ignore Aislings List on General Tab. It ignores ANY messages with the name(s) in it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ 10-25-14 *Fixes. - No longer targets items in dojo....LOL! - Elemus Mount option now correctly saves and loads with templates. - Always attack Leaders target fix (it didnt want to assail with alts).
10-18-14 *More minor fixes. - Fixed the AS/RS bashing ai for archers, it should now work smoothly with other skills and spells. - Bashers no longer target dion'd monsters, unless 1 monster in view. - Added the ab 1-24 bows to equip best weapon list. - Added D: delay command to Combo Settings.
10-15-14 *Some minor fixes. - Hidden alts lacking spells, will no longer break casting around non-friends. - If someone is skulled, it will now check to see if nearest person to them is skulled/trapped, to determine if you should go red them.
10-7-14 *New options on Skills tab - Added a checkbox to toggle brieslech for as/rs. - Added a checkbox to only use Skills if group members are in range #. - Added Yowien grey furs to Aman Jungle drop list. - Fixed a glitch with ignoring monsters (to prevent kill steals). - Fixed the pause all attacks hotkey toggle to be in sync.
10-6-14 *October Events update - Auto-close Red Moon Popup. - Added "/attack count" and "/attack countess". Manually create 314 and 315 spell tabs and select your target type to mpnd/frost/shock/ct, it will toggle attacks on/off.
10-3-14 *Npc Script Fix - Dojo/Carpet Merchants/Loures Harbor npc scripts needed updated.
9-25-14 *Minor edits. - Auto-repair glitch fixed (sometimes failed to repair). - Added Re-enter Insect Event checkbox to Misc tab.
9-9-14 *Ascension Update and Update Update. - Added /ascend hp, and /ascend mp, commands. - Added 'Instant Ascension' option and 'Buy To HP/MP' options, as well as some text labels to display some info. - Added Update updater to keep the updates updated, lets see if I can keep up. - Added updates I can remember over the past few weeks or so (random dates).
9-7-14 *You can't attack. - Added breisleich option in the Spell Monsters tab, perhaps I'll add Rescue skill later?
9-5-14 *Fixed a looting issue and /withdraw hax issue. - You no longer constantly re-loot the same items you dropped. - Popups should no longer glitch and should properly close after using /withdraw 'item'.
9-3-14 *Extra Walk Destinations + Slash Commands. - Added Tauren destination. - Added Chaos 3 end (entrance to 4). - Added East Woods 15 and 20 glades to craft armors. - Added Abel 5 and 10 caves to craft armors. - Added Oren Tower (for ez xp at low level). - Added slash commands for said areas and some other areas.
9-1-14 *Auto Guide and Hubae edits. - Type /monk, /rogue, /wizard, etc to walk to ToC and auto guide self. - Fixed /walk bat, added /walk crab. - Automated more sapphire stream popups - and some triggered walking.
8-29-14 *HG/Follow edits. - Added a function to follower that will walk to your alt from any map thats hardcoded into the walk destinations matrix, this makes leeching in HG a whole lot smoother since alts will no longer get left maps behind. - This edit to the follower has some unwanted results i've noticed so far and will eventually fix them, if you notice anything funny with alts turnning around and running the wrong way, let me know!
